title: Patriots release Antonio Brown - Emergency Podcast (Football 9/20)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to the news that the Patriots have released Antonio Brown just 11 days after signing the controversial wide receiver. The guys cover Brown's alleged antics, why New England took a risk, the impact on the Pats, which teams he could end up on next, and if he's a Hall of Famer. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
